thread.section_title: Sammydress 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Sammydress 的点评意见 | sammydress.com
thread.title: Mateo Tibaquirá Palacios
thread.title_full: Sammydress 的点评人 Mateo Tibaquirá Palacios

author: Mateo Tibaquirá Palacios
title: Mateo Tibaquirá Palacios
text: After some failed attempts to purchase stuff online, where the shipment went wrong or there were complications in the payment, SammyDress was the first clean experience for me purchasing on internet. It was straight forward to pay and track the packages to my country and home, as I watched the warehouse changes and the date the package arriving to the airport, etc. The products were better than I expected from a quality point of view (I imagined the cloth was ordinary given the offered price, but no) and I got my girlfriend and myself super happy with the stuff we got. Also, when I had doubts, their customer support responded my questions in a timely manner; i was sooo happy to see they paid attention to me (you do not get answers that fast everywhere), and now I am purchasing on SammyDress every time I see a product I like :)
